name: ethology
tag_list: digital-assets, consumer-insight, digital, brand, interactive-marketing, customer-engagement, web, social, mobile, media
overview: Ethology is a digital consultancy that helps brands leverage current and emerging audience hubs - web, social and mobile - to better understand and better serve their customers. The term ethology means the study of relations between an organism and its environment. In the same way, our firm builds and maximizes the digital relations between our clients and the marketplace. By coupling leading technology with a dedication to listening and consumer insights, we are able to craft strategies to thrill our clients customers and create deep, meaningful relationships. Ethology provides best-in-breed digital marketing services - determining the optimal method for brands to interact and relate with their customers, and then implementing those solutions.
